item.title: Fedora Setup
item.description: Fedora Setup # Pre Installation # Disk Partitions & Mounting Points # Size Mounting Point 100M /boot/efi 1G swap 40G / 50G /home Post Installation # System Update # sudo dnf update Enable Fusion RPM Repository # sudo dnf install https://download1.
